com.almasb.fxgl.net

Class NetworkConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.net.NetworkConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, MultiServer, Server

    public abstract class NetworkConnection
extends Object
    Represents a communication between two machines over network.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • addParser

        public <T extends Serializable> void addParser(Class<T> cl,
                                               DataParser<T> parser)
        Register a parser for specified class. The parser will be called back when an instance of the class arrives from the other end of connection
        Parameters:
        cl - data structure class
        parser - the data parser
